text:
Hi,
 
I am trying to use POI APIs for my project .... I want to hide & lock
particular cells on the Excel sheets 
I know that there are methods in HSSFCellStyle class namely, setLocked() and
setHidden() ......
 
But , they aren't working somehow .....
 
Can you please help me on this 
 
Thanks,
 
Deepak
creator: ddpanday@hotmail.com
poi-support@buni.org
text:
To start with: upgrade, you're SEVERAL releases behind and there is NO chance we'll be 
changing 1.0.x code ever.  Changing severity to normal, this isn't any more serious than 
anything else that we don't do (assuming that we don't).

creator: yegor@dinom.ru
text:
setLocked() and setHidden() have no effect until you protect the worksheet.
That is, you should call sheet.protectSheet to turn on these options.

Yegor
